title: #396: Music is for Drugs (@AriShaffir)
itunes:title: Music is for Drugs: A Solo Cast
description:
I took too many whatevers and went on a deep dive into the way music is a response to social events and drug use. It's a solecast originally on my patreon. Join, if you want, at patreon.com/arishaffir

This episode is proudly brought to you by YoKratom.com. Yo Kratom: The home of the $60 Kilo. 

The Music

Betty Blowtorch - Big Hair, Broken Heart

LCD Soundsystem - Losing My Edge

Peter Frampton - Do You Feel (Like I Do)

New Order - Blue Monday
